text: The 1975 GP Ouest-France was the 39th edition of the GP Ouest-France cycle race and was held on 28 August 1975. The race started and finished in Plouay. The race was won by Cyrille Guimard. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 55" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 40" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 40" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 45" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 45" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 45" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 45" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 45" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 45" |} |} ==References== 1975 Category:1975 in road cycling Category:1975 in French sport Category:August 1975 sports events in Europe
